description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to the Wizard’s Tower Screen Saver, just sit back and relax.  Let your avatar cast a few spells, look into the magical waters, and strike up a conversation with the mysterious Watery Voice.  But whatever you do, don’t wake the Book!
description.short: Welcome to the Wizard’s Tower Screen Saver, just sit back and relax.  Let your avatar cast a few spells, look into the magical waters, and strike up a conversation with the mysterious Watery Voice.  But whatever you do, don’t wake the Book!
